articles.author: TOI Sports Desk
articles.title: 'Look, to be brutally honest...': Pakistan's Mickey Arthur fumes after one-wicket defeat to South Africa - IndiaTimes
articles.description: Cricket News: Pakistan's team director, Mickey Arthur, expressed disappointment with the team's performance in the World Cup and stressed the need for improvement.

articles.author: The Quint
articles.title: ICC World Cup 2023: How Can Pakistan Still Qualify for the Semi-Finals? - The Quint
articles.description: ICC World Cup 2023: Pakistan’s chances of qualifying for the 2023 ICC World Cup semi-finals have further reduced considerably after they lost to South Africa. Here's how they can still make it to the top four.
articles.content:
Current Status 6 points from 5 matches
Remaining Matches New Zealand, England, Afghanistan, Bangladesh
What Pakistan need them to do  Considering Pakistans poor net run rate, Australia need to lose… [+780 chars]
